meanings.definition: A type of bolt used to fasten together the ends of railway tracks.
meanings.sent1: The workers used fishbolts to connect the railway tracks securely.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the fishbolts regularly to ensure the tracks are safe.
meanings.sent3: Why did the fishbolt bring a tiny umbrella to the railway? In case of a track shower!
meanings.sent4: The fishbolts were the unsung heroes holding the railway world together.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming fishbolts shimmered under the bright sun, a symbol of connection and safety.

meanings.definition: To secure or fasten with fishbolts.
meanings.sent1: He carefully fishbolts the ends of the tracks to prevent any accidents.
meanings.sent2: Remember to fishbolts the rails tightly to keep the train on the right path.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy engineer accidentally fishbolted his own foot to the railway track!
meanings.sent4: Her words fishbolted my attention, making me focus completely on her.
meanings.sent5: The friendship between them was fishbolted by shared experiences and trust.
